name: Coin-Op Kid
description:
You are the Coin-Op Kid and your job is to bring at least one coin to the final coin slot in each level. Don't forget that your life is currency—you need at least one coin inside you to stay alive.

  • Solve unique puzzle-platforming levels
  • Jumping will expel a coin!
  • Manage your coins to make it to the end
  • You must have at least one coin in you when you reach the final coin slot

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44 Jam. The theme was "Your life is currency". 

Controls
  • Keyboard:
    • Arrow keys to move
    • Z to Jump
    • X to shoot
    • R to restart
Credits
  • Vu Ha - Code
  • Rose Peng - Art
  • Johan Soriao - Audio
